name: The Egg On The Edge - ScoreSpace Jam #17
name_original: The Egg On The Edge - ScoreSpace Jam #17
description:
The Egg On The Edge There is an egg and it's on the edge.
It's up to you to protect it from the fall.

 

How to play

The egg will keep going until it crashes.
Get through the obstacles selecting a structure and clicking on an indicated location to place it.

Controls

You can play using only the mouse or on a touch device if you like.
The pro gamers can play with mouse and keyboard ;)

S - Bridge | W - Block

D - Ramp Up | A - Ramp Down
